mapper.insert: insert into evaluate_comp (id, company_id, company_name, add_time, level_mapping) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{levelMapping,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.select: select id, company_id, company_name, add_time, level_mapping from evaluate_comp
